data.title: WVEE-FM (Atlanta, GA): Contact Information, Journalists, and Overview
data.meta_description: Use Muck Rack to learn more about WVEE-FM (Atlanta, GA) and connect with journalists at WVEE-FM (Atlanta, GA).
data.text:
By Danie B Vice President Kamala Harris has picked a progressive, Midwest governor as her presidential running mate. Tim Walz is the current governor of Minnesota, and the VP's pick has many left wondering, "Who is this guy?"The V-103 News team has compiled some quick facts so that you can get a head start on learning more about one of this year's vice presidential candidates. Continue to read below!

On Saturday August 3rd the V-103 family came together to welcome Danie B back to the ATL with the Summer Skool Volume 1 Day Party! Attendees played games, like spades, uno, and connect four; ate some great food, enjoyed signature Usher-themed Remy cocktails, won prizes, and raised $5,000 for the Social Butterflies Foundation, an organization that provides resources for lupus and fibromyalgia patients. Check out some of the pictures from the event below!

For the past couple of weeks The People Station V-103 has been promoting the Summer Skool Vol. 1 Black Party. For this first edition of the block party, V-103 welcomed Danie B back to the Atlanta, and raised money for the Social Butterflies Foundation, a non profit organization that helps find resources for Lupus patients. Chastity Corbett is a Lupus Survivor and she is also the founder of the Social Butterflies Foundation.

The People's station V-103 is always in the community! This time, we're teaming up with our very own Greg Street, Bruce Griggs and the Saving Our Sons Campaign to present the Boys To Men Lock-In. This is a back to school violence prevention boot camp for boys ages 8-15. The lock-in will take place at C.T. Martin Auditorium Friday August 2, at 6p through Saturday August 3, 8pm. There will be discussions on violence, gang prevention, and what to do if you're stopped by the police.

The Back to school season is upon us and The People Station V-103 is here to support parent, students and teachers all school year long. We've shown up at the Back to School events, and all week long superintendents from Metro Atlanta school districts will be on to give parents and teacher pertinent information for the upcoming school year.

By As we move closer and closer to the presidential election, V-103 wants to make sure you have everything you need to make your voice heard. Check this page for all the information you need on things voting. To find out your voting status, head to the secretary of State Website HERE.

Vice President Kamala Harris will be in the ATL on Tuesday for a campaign event. This will be her first appearance in Georgia since Joe Biden ended his reelection campaign and endorsed Kamala as the democratic candidate for president. So far multiple sources say that the vice president will be at the Georgia State Convocation Center on Tuesday afternoon.

And no...I don't mean that we're goin' to take this bad boy into the woods... I'm talkin' about huntin' Vettes, Lambos, even McLarens!Yes...give me a more neutral color than the "Arrest Me Orange" that we had on our test IONIQ 5 N, and turn me loose! This is one serious machine. Perhaps one of the fastest all-electric vehicles on the road today.
